data.title: Information And Communications Technology
data.meta_description: Abs - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. ABS-CBN Corporation is the largest media conglomerate in the Philippines, dominating television, radio, and online media. It was formed through the merger of Alto Broadcasting System and Chronicle Broadcasting Network in the 1950s. ABS-CBN traces its beginnings to the post-WWII era and was seized under martial law but returned to the Lopez family in 1986. Today it remains the country's dominant media company with various business interests.
